example.eg: He was in a good mood after passing the exam.
example.egtrans: 他通过考试后心情很好。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 心情，情绪, 心情不好，郁郁寡欢

example.eg: The mood of the electorate is unhappy, with joblessness high.
example.egtrans: 高居不下的失业率让选民们情绪不高。

example.eg: Non-native speakers have trouble with the subjunctive mood.
example.egtrans: 非母语者很难理解虚拟语气。

dsense.name: mood
dsense.guideword: informal ([sth] relatable, reflects your feelings) (非正式用语)

example.eg: Maya posted the image of the grumpy cat with the caption: "Mood".
example.egtrans: 玛雅发了一张臭脸猫的照片，配文“同感”。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 有同感, 能引起共鸣, 我也是

example.eg: I wouldn't ask him at the moment, given his bad mood.
She has good moods and bad moods – there's no predicting it.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 好心情, 心情愉快, 情绪好

example.eg: Josh will be in a bad mood when he finds out you've eaten his chocolate.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 心情不好, 情绪不佳
心情暴躁, 心情非常不好

example.eg: I got an excellent mark for my translation today, so I'm in a good mood.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 心情愉快的, 好心情的

example.eg: Let me know when you're in the mood for a game of chess.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 有心情的, 有情绪的

dsense.name: lift [sb]'s spirits, raise [sb]'s spirits, lift [sb]'s mood

example.eg: These party songs are guaranteed to lift your spirits.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 振奋...的精神, 让...精神好起来

example.eg: Bethany was in a low mood after the death of her mother.

dsense.name: mood board
dsense.guideword: (display used to plan or design [sth]) (设计)

example.eg: When she took her meds, you wouldn't have known she had a mood disorder.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 情绪障碍，情绪紊乱，情绪失调

dsense.name: mood ring
dsense.guideword: (finger jewellery that changes colour) (变色戒指)

example.eg: I gave a mood ring to my girlfriend.
Bipolar disorder is characterized by mood swings.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 情绪波动, 情绪起伏

example.eg: I'm not in the mood to listen to your lies.
